info.name: Flight Rising: dragon profile flat subtle
info.description: Style for aesthetic changes to the 7th FR anniversary updated dragon pages. removed like button and made some things more subtle
info.additionalInfo:
I won't be updating this any further. {edit: okay, this is the last time, unless they go and change things around again}

-hide like button
-smaller expand button for dragon info
-solid and unlined dragon info boxes 
-relocated familiar name below familiar
-thinner HP+Bond bars
-Faded inactive (red) buttons + name familiar icon + Dragon EXP bar
-overflow scroll for info boxes show up when zoomed out
-apparel customisation : made the tabs smaller.

flightrising.com, flight rising,
